languages.text: "Надеюсь, жертвы, что мы принесли сегодня Имматериуму здоровьем своего разума, не были напрасны и помогут Вашей Светлости. Я..." {n}Хормейстер морщится от боли.{/n} "...Все еще не могу поверить, что мы пережили это".

traits.locale_text: "Надеюсь, жертвы, что мы принесли сегодня Имматериуму здоровьем своего разума, не были напрасны и помогут Вашей Светлости. Я..." {n}Хормейстер морщится от боли.{/n} "...Все еще не могу поверить, что мы пережили это".

languages.text: "We sacrificed some of the soundness of our minds to the Immaterium today. I hope it was not in vain and will help Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I..." {n}He winces in pain.{/n} "I still cannot believe we survived this."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, жертвы, что мы принесли сегодня Имматериуму здоровьем своего разума, не были напрасны и помогут Вашей Светлости. Я..." {n}Хормейстер морщится от боли.{/n} "...Все еще не могу поверить, что мы пережили это".

traits.locale_text: "We sacrificed some of the soundness of our minds to the Immaterium today. I hope it was not in vain and will help Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I..." {n}He winces in pain.{/n} "I still cannot believe we survived this."
"Some of the soundness of our minds had to be sacrificed to the Immaterium today. I hope it was not in vain and will help Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"We sacrificed some of the soundness of our minds to the Immaterium today. I hope it was not in vain and will help Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I..." {n}He winces in pain.{/n} "I still cannot believe we survived this."
"Some of the soundness of our minds had to be sacrificed to the Immaterium today. I hope it was not in vain and will help Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

"We sacrificed some of the soundness of our minds to the Immaterium today. I hope it was not in vain and will help Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I..." {n}He winces in pain.{/n} "I still cannot believe we survived this."

"We sacrificed some of the soundness of our minds to the Immaterium today. I hope it was not in vain and will help Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I..." {n}He winces in pain.{/n} "I still cannot believe we survived this."

"We sacrificed some of the soundness of our minds to the Immaterium today. I hope it was not in vain and will help Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I..." {n}He winces in pain.{/n} "I still cannot believe we survived this."

"We sacrificed some of the soundness of our minds to the Immaterium today. I hope it was not in vain and will help Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I..." {n}He winces in pain.{/n} "I still cannot believe we survived this."

languages.text: «Hoy hemos sacrificado parte de nuestra cordura al Inmaterio. Espero que no haya sido en vano y que el resultado sea de ayuda para mi{mf|lord|lady}. Yo...». {n}Su rostro se contrae en una mueca de dolor.{/n} «Todavía no me puedo creer que hayamos sobrevivido».
languages.original_text: "We sacrificed some of the soundness of our minds to the Immaterium today. I hope it was not in vain and will help Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I..." {n}He winces in pain.{/n} "I still cannot believe we survived this."

traits.locale_text: «Hoy hemos sacrificado parte de nuestra cordura al Inmaterio. Espero que no haya sido en vano y que el resultado sea de ayuda para mi{mf|lord|lady}. Yo...». {n}Su rostro se contrae en una mueca de dolor.{/n} «Todavía no me puedo creer que hayamos sobrevivido».

languages.text: 「私たちは今日、健やかな心をいくつか非物質世界に差し出しました。それが無駄になることなく、陛下のお役に立つことを願っております」{n}彼は痛みに声を上げる。{/n}「この状況から生き残れたことが今もまだ信じられません」
languages.original_text: "We sacrificed some of the soundness of our minds to the Immaterium today. I hope it was not in vain and will help Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I..." {n}He winces in pain.{/n} "I still cannot believe we survived this."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちは今日、健やかな心をいくつか非物質世界に差し出しました。それが無駄になることなく、陛下のお役に立つことを願っております」{n}彼は痛みに声を上げる。{/n}「この状況から生き残れたことが今もまだ信じられません」

languages.text: “我们的一部分理智变成了献给亚空间的祭品。我希望这样的努力并非徒劳，希望我们找到的线索能对您有所帮助，大人。”{n}他痛苦地瑟缩着。{/n}“我还是不敢相信，我们居然真的活了下来。”
languages.original_text: "We sacrificed some of the soundness of our minds to the Immaterium today. I hope it was not in vain and will help Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I..." {n}He winces in pain.{/n} "I still cannot believe we survived this."

traits.locale_text: “我们的一部分理智变成了献给亚空间的祭品。我希望这样的努力并非徒劳，希望我们找到的线索能对您有所帮助，大人。”{n}他痛苦地瑟缩着。{/n}“我还是不敢相信，我们居然真的活了下来。”

languages.text: "Wir haben heute einen Teil unseres Verstandes dem Immaterium geopfert. Hoffentlich war es nicht umsonst und wird Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} helfen. Ich ..." {n}Er zuckt vor Schmerz zusammen.{/n} "Ich kann immer noch nicht glauben, dass wir das hier überlebt haben."
languages.original_text: "We sacrificed some of the soundness of our minds to the Immaterium today. I hope it was not in vain and will help Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I..." {n}He winces in pain.{/n} "I still cannot believe we survived this."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben heute einen Teil unseres Verstandes dem Immaterium geopfert. Hoffentlich war es nicht umsonst und wird Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} helfen. Ich ..." {n}Er zuckt vor Schmerz zusammen.{/n} "Ich kann immer noch nicht glauben, dass wir das hier überlebt haben."

languages.text: « Nous avons sacrifié aujourd'hui une partie de notre santé mentale à l'Immaterium. J'espère que nos efforts n'ont pas été vains et que cela sera utile à Votre Seigneurie. Je... » {n}Une grimace dolente lui chiffonne les traits.{/n} « Je n'arrive toujours pas à croire que nous ayons survécu à cette épreuve. »
languages.original_text: "We sacrificed some of the soundness of our minds to the Immaterium today. I hope it was not in vain and will help Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I..." {n}He winces in pain.{/n} "I still cannot believe we survived this."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons sacrifié aujourd'hui une partie de notre santé mentale à l'Immaterium. J'espère que nos efforts n'ont pas été vains et que cela sera utile à Votre Seigneurie. Je... » {n}Une grimace dolente lui chiffonne les traits.{/n} « Je n'arrive toujours pas à croire que nous ayons survécu à cette épreuve. »

languages.text: "Bugün akıl sağlığımızın bir kısmını Tindiyar'a kurban verdik. Umarım ki tüm bunlar beyhude yere yaşanmamıştır ve {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne faydası olur. Ben..." {n}Acıyla irkiliyor.{/n} "Bundan sağ çıktığımıza hâlâ inanamıyorum."
languages.original_text: "We sacrificed some of the soundness of our minds to the Immaterium today. I hope it was not in vain and will help Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I..." {n}He winces in pain.{/n} "I still cannot believe we survived this."
